posts.post_text: April 23, 2016 at 4:55 AM#2PresetType Timing (the columns you see at the end of the Sequence Exec sheet) is not available via the Command Line at the moment.Or are you talking about iTime?

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: April 23, 2016 at 10:26 AM#4make sure to already have a created a filter that only allow valuetimes to pass. e.g. Filter 3Remove Presettype 1 If Filter 3
